settings.title: Strava API Settings
settings.notConnected: Not connected to Strava. Save your settings first, then connect.
settings.name: Name
settings.birthYear: Birth Year (for Heart Rate Zone Calculation)
settings.birthYearDescription: This is used to calculate your estimated maximum heart rate (220 - age) for heart rate zone analysis.
settings.llmPrefixPlaceholder: e.g., Analyze this fitness data as a professional coach and provide insights on...
settings.llmPrefixDescription: This custom prefix will be added to the beginning of activity data when generating LLM summaries. Use it to provide context or specific instructions for AI analysis of your fitness data.
settings.exportDescription: Download all your activity data as a JSON file for backup or transfer.
settings.importDescription: Import previously exported data. This will replace all current data.
settings.importWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Import will replace all existing data. You can import data even when not authenticated.
settings.dangerZoneDescription: If you're experiencing database issues, you can reset all data. This will clear all stored activities and settings.

activities.title: Activities
activities.connectToStart: Connect to Strava to start analyzing your activities.
activities.fetchStreamsTooltip: Fetch detailed stream data for all visible activities
activities.noActivitiesMatchFilters: No activities match your filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
activities.noActivitiesFound: No activities found. Try refreshing or check your Strava account.

activityDetail.llmSummaryTooltip: Copy activity summary for LLM analysis
activityDetail.streamDataAvailable: üìä Enhanced charts available with detailed GPS and sensor data
activityDetail.maxHRDescription: Based on estimated max HR: {{maxHR}} bpm (Age: {{age}})
activityDetail.setBirthYearForZones: To see heart rate zone distribution, please set your birth year in settings.
activityDetail.setBirthYearForEffort: To see relative effort analysis, please set your birth year in settings.

success.dataImported: Data imported successfully! Please refresh the page.

error.required: Client ID and Client Secret are required
error.invalidBirthYear: Please enter a valid birth year
error.exportData: Failed to export data. Please try again.
error.resetDatabase: Failed to reset database. Please try again.
error.saveClientId: Please save your Client ID first
